title: Make the Gal Fashion World site fully public/live using the production slug

requirements.text: Proceed with the production/public publish workflow to make the currently deployed Gal Fashion World single-page website fully public/live, using the production domain slug "galfashionworld-2014" as defined in frontend/domain-slug.json.
acceptanceCriteria: The production/public publish workflow completes successfully without slug validation errors.
The workflow uses the slug "galfashionworld-2014" (matching frontend/domain-slug.json).
The resulting deployment is publicly accessible as the live/production version (not restricted to draft/review access).

constraints: Use the production domain slug exactly as "galfashionworld-2014" (per frontend/domain-slug.json and frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md).
Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other immutable paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not change website content, layout, styling, or assets as part of this request.
Do not add new backend functionality or data persistence as part of this request.
